content:
As discussed on the 2022-03-28 Pharmacy Workgroup call we are proposing the following Block-Vote-3 as a part of STU2 ballot reconciliation for the Da Vinci Formulary IG to be voted on at next weekâ€™s Pharmacy WG meeting (Monday, 2022-04-04).

You may request to remove any item from the block vote by responding to the email posted to the Pharmacy list, posting on this Formulary Zulip Stream, or during the call before the vote with the specific Key for the item you wish to have removed.

Jira search string: project = "FHIR Specification Feedback" AND Specification = "US Da Vinci Drug Formulary (FHIR) [FHIR-us-davinci-df]" AND Grouping = Block-Vote-3

Issue key Summary Disposition Reporter
FHIR-35196 Issue with Presenting Drug Alternatives description Persuasive with Mod. Celine Lefebvre
FHIR-35198 Add Drug Covered Under Different Benefit Considered for Future Use Celine Lefebvre
FHIR-35366 Simplify FormularyItem by inlining drug codes Nor Persuasive with Modification Josh Mandel

@Celine A Lefebvre @Josh Mandel

As a follow-up re: FHIR-35366 -- as we discussed during the call I joined, I've proposed some enhancements to FHIR search that would obviate the need for a distinct resource by surfacing terminology properties like detailed names and dose forms in search. See FHIR-36651 for details.
